name: AttachBlogToLanguageGroup
description:
Attach a blog to a multi-language group in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to attach a blog to a specified multi-language group within HubSpot CMS. It is helpful when managing blogs in different languages and ensuring they are correctly grouped.

parameters.name: designated_language
parameters.description: The language code of the blog to add to a multi-language group. Use standard language codes like 'en', 'fr', etc.

value_schema.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

parameters.name: object_id_to_add
parameters.description: ID of the blog object to be added to a multi-language group in HubSpot CMS.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to add to a multi-language group.

parameters.name: primary_language_object_id
parameters.description: ID of the primary language object in the multi-language group to which the blog will be attached.

value_schema.description: ID of primary language object in multi-language group.

parameters.name: primary_language
parameters.description: Primary language code for the multi-language group to which the blog should be attached (e.g., 'en', 'fr').

value_schema.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.
